channel.title: Learn, Practice, Summarize, Share
channel.description: Recent content on Learn, Practice, Summarize, Share

item.title: Kubernetes Container Stack
item.description: In Kubernetes 1.24, dockershim will be removed. What does it mean, let’s take a look the container stackbefore and after dockershim removal. Objective To walkthrough container stack on a Kubernetes node. Before 1.24 release Since 1.24 release Walk-through Using the opportunity, we can walkthrough the container stack and corresponding tooling on a Kubernetes node from top to bottom. apiserver apiserver sits on the Kubernetes master, validates and configures data for the api objects which include pods, services, replicationcontrollers and others.

item.title: Productivity Tools
item.description: This post collects productivity tools used in my daily worklife. Documenting Excalidraw: Draw a diagram DokuWiki Programming Visual Studio Code: Edit code SourceGraph: Search the Github OpenGrok: Search any code, host your own git: Distributed version control system github.com: Well known code repository Review Board: Review Code Gerrit Code Review Jekins: CI/CD tools JIRA: an enterprise bug tracking system Bugzilla: an open source bug tracking system remark: A simple, in-browser, markdown-driven slideshow tool.

item.title: Hello, The Infra Guy
item.description: This post describes how I created this blog website using a couple of hours. Objective The objective is to build a website using Hugo and Github Pages. Steps Follow the steps listed below: Create a Github account if you do not have one Create a Github Repository Keep in mind, you can’t use user name and password to access Git Repo now. You have to use a token a SSH key for the sake of security.
